title: 12/29/2020 - HOUR 3 - James Harrison & Jamal Adams
itunes:title: 12/29/2020 - HOUR 3 - James Harrison & Jamal Adams
description:
Colin talks to 2-time Super Bowl champion James Harrison about the Steelers chances to win it all after a sluggish end to the regular season. Seahawks safety Jamal Adams joins the show to discuss their resurgent defense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
